item.title: Notes from Getting Real by Basecamp
item.description: Don’t build a company that follows competitors. If they add 10 features, you don’t need to add 20. Don’t be defensive and paranoid.

item.title: Notes from Stillness is the Key by Ryan Holiday
item.description: Stillness of the Mind Be present and focused. Ruminating about the past or worrying about the future affects your performance the most.
